text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _HL7AccommodationCode

name: HL7AccommodationCode
title: HL7AccommodationCode
description: **Description:**Accommodation type. In Intent mood, represents the accommodation type requested. In Event mood, represents accommodation assigned/used. In Definition mood, represents the available accommodation type.
